Text: Fai, uwe̩ ki kʼo̩la-we̩ wa jo̩ udala udala,
Todule̩ oñ i atʼuma no̩ gbogbo wʼe̩gba
Tak owñ adago akʼije̩ ñw ujo̩-wñ je̩ ef ukpahiu Jihofa,
oñ ama anʼo̩kwo̩chageli fʼane̩ Asiria gwʼalache̩ rinyo̩,
Tak e̩bo̩bo̩ abo Jekob ajʼef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi,
Oñ i awatu iko le̩, Jihofa aka-i,
Oñ nakʼewo ewo ane̩-we̩ du da rinyo̩;
U lañʼakʼe̩wñ amobochi da rinyo̩ bʼo̩wo̩-we̩ te̩,
u la akʼojibo-we̩ ku me̩ gbe̩,
Tak omi achi Ashe̩rim-we̩ bʼalumeji-we̩ te̩;
E̩gbale̩ omi anache̩ ef uwe̩do̩ kpʼuke̩do̩fulu
